Uses of Package
playn.core

  • Packages that use playn.core 
    Package Description
    playn.core  
    playn.core.canvas  
    playn.core.gl  
    playn.core.json  
    playn.core.util  
  • Classes in playn.core used by playn.core 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAssets.ImageReceiver 
    AbstractLayer
    Base Layer implementation shared among platforms (to avoid reinventing the transform logic).
    AbstractLayer.Flag 
    AbstractLayer.Interaction
    Used to dispatch pointer/touch/mouse events to layers.
    AbstractLayer.Interactor 
    AbstractPlatform
    Implements some common Platform bits.
    AbstractSound 
    Analytics 
    Analytics.Category 
    Assets
    Fetches and returns assets.
    AssetWatcher.Listener
    A listener that is notified of asset loading progress and failures.
    AsyncImage
    An interface used by AbstractAssets.
    Audio 
    Canvas
    A 2d drawing canvas.
    Canvas.Composite
    Values that may be used with Canvas.setCompositeOperation(Composite).
    Canvas.LineCap
    Values that may be used with Canvas.setLineCap(LineCap).
    Canvas.LineJoin
    Values that may be used with Canvas.setLineJoin(LineJoin).
    CanvasImage
    An image that provides a Canvas that allows you to draw directly into the image.
    Connection
    Represents a listener registration and allows unregistration.
    Events.Flags
    Defines some information for how event processing may be controlled.
    Events.Input
    The base for all input events.
    Events.Input.Impl 
    Events.Position
    The base for all events with pointer position.
    Events.Position.Impl 
    Font
    Contains metadata for a font.
    Font.Style
    The styles that may be requested for a given font.
    Game
    Main game API.
    Gradient
    A gradient fill pattern created by Graphics.createLinearGradient(float, float, float, float, int[], float[]) or Graphics.createRadialGradient(float, float, float, int[], float[]) .
    Graphics
    Main 2D graphics interface.
    GroupLayer
    GroupLayer creates a Layer hierarchy by maintaining an ordered group of child Layers.
    GroupLayer.Clipped
    A clipped group layer.
    Image
    The base image interface.
    Image.BitmapTransformer
    Used with Image.transform(playn.core.Image.BitmapTransformer).
    Image.Region
    A subregion of an image.
    ImageLayer
    A layer that displays a bitmapped image.
    ImmediateLayer
    Represents a layer that enables direct rendering into the framebuffer.
    ImmediateLayer.Clipped
    An immediate layer that is clipped to a specified bounds.
    ImmediateLayer.Renderer
    Defines a callback that is invoked every frame to render an immediate layer.
    InternalTransform
    Exposes internals of our transform to the graphics backends.
    Json
    PlayN JSON parsing and serialization interface.
    Json.Array
    Represents a parsed JSON array as a simple int->value map.
    Json.Object
    Represents a parsed JSON object as a simple string->value map.
    Json.TypedArray
    A JSON array that assumes all values are of a uniform JSON type.
    Json.Writer
    A JsonSink that writes JSON to a string.
    Key
    Enumerates all possible keys that may be encountered on all platforms.
    Keyboard
    Input-device interface for keyboard events.
    Keyboard.Event
    An event dispatched when a key is pressed or released.
    Keyboard.Listener 
    Keyboard.TextType
    Enumerates the different mobile keyboard types that can be requested.
    Keyboard.TypedEvent
    An event dispatched when a printable character is typed.
    Layer
    Layer is the base element for all rendering in PlayN
    Layer.HasSize
    Interface for Layers containing explicit sizes.
    Layer.HitTester
    Used to customize a layer's hit testing mechanism.
    Log
    Simple PlayN logging interface.
    Log.Collector
    Allows for collection of log messages (in addition to standard logging).
    Log.Level
    Tags a log message with a level.
    Mouse
    Input-device interface for mouse events.
    Mouse.ButtonEvent
    An event dispatched when a button is pressed.
    Mouse.ButtonEvent.Impl 
    Mouse.LayerListener
    An interface for listening to mouse events that interact with a single layer.
    Mouse.Listener
    An interface for listening to all mouse events.
    Mouse.MotionEvent
    An event dispatched when the mouse is moved.
    Mouse.MotionEvent.Impl 
    Mouse.WheelEvent
    An event dispatched when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
    Mouse.WheelEvent.Impl 
    MouseImpl
    Handles the common logic for all platform Mouse implementations.
    Net
    PlayN network interface.
    Net.Builder
    Builds a request and allows it to be configured and executed.
    Net.Response
    Communicates an HTTP response to the caller.
    Net.WebSocket
    Encapsulates a web socket.
    Net.WebSocket.Listener
    Notifies game of web socket events.
    NetImpl.BuilderImpl 
    NetImpl.Header 
    NetImpl.ResponseImpl 
    Path
    A path object created by Canvas.createPath().
    Pattern
    A bitmap fill pattern created by Image.toPattern().
    Platform
    Generic platform interface.
    Platform.Type 
    PlayN.LifecycleListener
    Used to receive lifecycle notifications.
    Pointer
    Input-device interface for pointer events.
    Pointer.Event
    The event dispatched to pointer listeners.
    Pointer.Event.Impl 
    Pointer.Listener 
    RegularExpression
    TODO: flush out.
    Sound
    A sound.
    Sound.Silence
    A sound that does nothing.
    StockInternalTransform
    The default InternalTransform instance, used on non-JavaScript platforms.
    Storage
    Stores settings in a key/value map.
    Storage.Batch
    Represents a batch of edits to be applied to storage in one transaction.
    Surface
    TODO
    SurfaceImage
    An image that provides a Surface into which you can render.
    SurfaceLayer
    Represents a layer that maintains an off-screen texture into which one can render by calling methods on SurfaceLayer.surface().
    TextFormat
    Contains configuration for laying out and drawing single- or multi-line text to a Canvas.
    TextFormat.Alignment
    Used to align multiline text.
    TextLayout
    Contains metrics and metadata for a laid out body of text.
    Touch
    Input-device interface for touch and multi-touch events if they are supported.
    Touch.Event
    An event dispatched to report touch information.
    Touch.Event.Impl 
    Touch.LayerListener
    An interface for listening to touch events that interact with a single layer.
    Touch.Listener
    An interface for listening to all touch events.
    TouchImpl
    Handles the common logic for all platform Touch implementations.
    UIOverlay
    Platforms that support native widgets need to put those widgets in a native container above the PlayN GL layers.
